title: Free Online Image & PDF Tools Website

requirements.text: Implement a modern dark + gradient professional UI with a hero section, clean typography, tool category tabs (Image Tools / PDF Tools), smooth CSS transitions, lazy loading for tool cards, and a layout optimized for Core Web Vitals. Do NOT include any owner name in the header or title. The footer must display 'Created by Anurag Singh' and SEO hashtags: #FreeOnlineTools #ImageCompressor #PDFConverter #OnlineTools #AdSenseWebsite #SEOTools #WebTools #DigitalTools.
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage has a prominent hero section with headline and call-to-action
Tab navigation switches between Image Tools and PDF Tools categories
Dark background with gradient accents applied consistently
Footer displays 'Created by Anurag Singh' and all listed SEO hashtags
No owner name appears in the header or page title
Layout is fully mobile responsive

requirements.text: Build 10 fully functional client-side Image Tools, each on a dedicated page: Image Compressor, Image Resizer, JPG to PNG, PNG to JPG, Image Cropper, Image Rotator, Image to WebP, WebP to JPG, Background Remover (basic — remove solid/near-solid background color), and Image Metadata Viewer. Each tool page must have an SEO title, meta description, Open Graph tags, Twitter Card tags, JSON-LD structured data (Tool schema), breadcrumb navigation, FAQ section, and related tools suggestions.
acceptanceCriteria: All 10 image tools are accessible via clean URLs (e.g., /tools/image-compressor)
Each tool accepts file input and produces a downloadable output
Image Compressor reduces file size client-side
Image Resizer accepts width/height inputs and outputs resized image
JPG↔PNG and WebP conversions work via canvas API
Image Cropper provides drag-to-crop UI
Image Rotator supports 90/180/270 degree rotation
Background Remover removes a user-specified or auto-detected background color
Image Metadata Viewer displays EXIF/file metadata
Each page has correct meta title, description, OG tags, Twitter card, JSON-LD Tool schema, breadcrumb, FAQ, and related tools section

requirements.text: Build 11 fully functional PDF Tools, each on a dedicated page: PDF to Word (extract text), Word to PDF (HTML/text to PDF), PDF Merge, PDF Split, PDF Compressor, PDF Lock (password protect), PDF Unlock (remove password), Add Watermark to PDF, PDF Page Number Adder, PDF to JPG, and JPG to PDF. Each tool page must have an SEO title, meta description, Open Graph tags, Twitter Card tags, JSON-LD structured data (Tool schema), breadcrumb navigation, FAQ section, and related tools suggestions. Use client-side PDF libraries (e.g., pdf-lib, pdfjs-dist) where possible; use the Motoko backend for any server-side processing needed.
acceptanceCriteria: All 11 PDF tools are accessible via clean URLs (e.g., /tools/pdf-merge)
PDF Merge accepts multiple PDFs and outputs a single merged PDF
PDF Split accepts page range inputs and outputs separate PDFs
PDF Lock accepts a password and outputs a password-protected PDF
PDF Unlock accepts a password and outputs an unlocked PDF
Add Watermark accepts text input and overlays it on all pages
PDF Page Number Adder appends page numbers to each page
PDF to JPG converts each page to a downloadable JPG
JPG to PDF combines uploaded images into a single PDF
Each page has correct meta title, description, OG tags, Twitter card, JSON-LD Tool schema, breadcrumb, FAQ, and related tools section

requirements.text: Implement AdSense-compatible ad placement layout throughout the site: (1) Header banner ad space (728×90 leaderboard slot), (2) In-content banner ads between tool sections, (3) Sidebar ad column on tool pages (300×250 rectangle), (4) Sticky bottom ad bar, (5) Delayed popup ad (appears after 5 seconds, dismissible), (6) Between-tools ad blocks on the homepage tool grid. Mark every ad slot with an HTML comment <!-- Google AdSense Banner Here --> and ensure the layout is auto-ads compatible and does not violate AdSense content policies.

quotes: Clearly comment sections like: <!-- Google AdSense Banner Here -->
Ensure layout does not violate AdSense policy

acceptanceCriteria: Header contains a clearly commented 728×90 ad slot placeholder
Homepage tool grid has ad block placeholders interspersed every 4–6 tools
Tool pages have a 300×250 sidebar ad placeholder
A sticky bottom bar ad placeholder is present on all pages
A delayed popup ad appears after 5 seconds with a close button
All ad slots have <!-- Google AdSense Banner Here --> comments in the HTML
No ad slot overlaps content or violates AdSense policy layout guidelines

requirements.text: Build a secure admin panel accessible at the /admin route. It must include: a login page with username and password fields and session-based authentication. After login, a dashboard must display: total visitors (all-time), daily visitors, per-tool usage counts, most-used tools ranked list, total page views, basic ad click simulation tracking, and a simple bar/line chart for analytics. Admin access must be gated — unauthenticated users are redirected to /admin/login. Store analytics data (visitor counts, tool usage) in the Motoko backend.
acceptanceCriteria: /admin redirects unauthenticated users to /admin/login
Login page accepts username and password and creates a session on success
Dashboard displays total visitors, daily visitors, page views, and tool usage counts
A ranked list of most-used tools is shown
A simple chart (bar or line) visualizes daily visitor or tool usage trends
Ad click simulation counter is displayed on the dashboard
Backend stores and retrieves visitor counts, page views, and tool usage data

requirements.text: Implement comprehensive SEO across the entire site: proper H1/H2 heading hierarchy on every page, unique meta title and meta description per page, Open Graph tags, Twitter Card tags, a sitemap.xml, a robots.txt, FAQ schema markup (JSON-LD) on tool pages, breadcrumb schema, internal linking between related tools, and US-traffic-focused keyword targeting on key pages including: 'free online tools', 'image compressor online', 'pdf converter free', 'resize image online free', 'merge pdf online'.
acceptanceCriteria: Every page has a unique H1 and logical H2 structure
Every page has unique meta title and meta description containing target keywords
OG and Twitter Card tags are present on all pages
sitemap.xml lists all tool pages, blog pages, and legal pages
robots.txt is correctly configured
Tool pages include FAQ JSON-LD and BreadcrumbList JSON-LD
Internal links connect related tools on each tool page

requirements.text: Create five AdSense-compliant legal pages: About Us, Contact (with a working contact form that submits to the backend and stores messages), Privacy Policy, Disclaimer, and Terms & Conditions. Each page must be professionally written, include proper meta tags, and be linked in the footer navigation.

quotes: Must be professional and AdSense compliant

acceptanceCriteria: All five legal pages are accessible via clean URLs (/about, /contact, /privacy-policy, /disclaimer, /terms)
Contact form submits and stores the message in the backend; user sees a success confirmation
All five pages are linked in the footer
Each page has its own meta title and description
Content is professional and covers topics required for AdSense approval

requirements.text: Build a blog section with: a blog index page listing articles by category, individual SEO-optimized article pages with a consistent template (title, meta, OG, JSON-LD Article schema, author, date, related tools sidebar), and at least 3 seed blog posts targeting US keywords relevant to image and PDF tools. Include an internal linking structure that connects blog posts to relevant tool pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Blog index at /blog lists all articles with category filters
Individual article pages use a consistent template with title, meta, OG, JSON-LD Article schema
At least 3 seed articles exist targeting image/PDF tool keywords
Each article page links to at least 2 related tools
Blog categories are navigable and filterable

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive dark gradient visual theme: deep dark navy/charcoal base (#0d0d1a to #1a1a2e range), vibrant cyan-to-violet gradient accents for buttons and highlights, clean sans-serif typography (system or Google Fonts), card-based tool grid layout with subtle glow hover effects, and a gradient hero section with headline, subheadline, and a search/browse CTA. Enforce this theme consistently across all pages including tool pages, admin panel, legal pages, and blog.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages use the dark base color palette consistently
Buttons and key UI elements use the cyan-to-violet gradient
Hero section is visually prominent with gradient background and clear CTA
Tool cards have hover glow/highlight effects
Typography is clean, readable, and consistent across all pages
Theme is applied to admin panel and all secondary pages

constraints: All Motoko logic must live in a single main actor (backend/main.mo)
Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
No Node.js/Express or Next.js — use Motoko backend as specified by the platform
No external email services for the contact form — store submissions in the Motoko backend only
No third-party authentication — session simulation via React state is acceptable for admin
Ad slots must be placeholder divs with comments only — no actual AdSense script injection
Footer must display exactly: 'Created by Anurag Singh'
No owner name in the header or site title
nonGoals: Real Google AdSense script integration (placeholders only)
Real email delivery for contact form
Real PDF password encryption via native crypto (basic simulation acceptable)
AI-powered background removal (basic color-based removal only)
Real-time analytics or WebSocket-based live visitor tracking
User accounts or user authentication beyond admin login

required: Dark gradient hero background with abstract geometric grid lines and subtle cyan/violet glow nodes — wide format banner (hero-bg.dim_1920x600.png)
Site logo mark — minimalist icon combining an image frame and PDF page symbol with cyan-violet gradient fill (logo-icon.dim_128x128.png)
Open Graph default social share image with site name 'ToolsHub Free' on dark gradient background (og-default.dim_1200x630.png)
